## Introduction

Here is a report about the Titanic

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)
```

## Data

Sample of data for analysis shown in Table 1.

```{r load data}
titanic_data <- read.csv("../data/titanic.csv") |> 
    select(fare, age) |> 
    slice(1:10)
knitr::kable(titanic_data,
             caption = "Fare and age valus for the first 10 observations in the Titanic dataset")
```

## Results

Compare fare and passenger age in Figure 1.

``` {r scatter-plot}
ggplot(titanic_data, aes(x = age, y = fare)) +
    geom_point()
```
